name: Zarah: Das Schloss des Gwoor
overview: Intuitive control with the stylus and screen. Solve many tricky puzzles and help Zarah thwart Gwoor's plans. The various elements make this title both an adventurous role-playing game and an exciting simulation. Save the magic forest and take care of the loving farm of Zarah's uncle. Free the 3 unicorn foals and experience an adventurous adventure with Zarah and her unicorn.
